reviewText: The shipping store sent the wrong item and after contacting customer service, The wrong item was sent back  and a replacement sent. This is a cute follow up movie to the live action Ouran High School j-drama. Worth it to complete the series.
This was weird.  It was good, But hella weird. I loved the manga and anime. I didn't like how low honeys voice was it kind of freaked me out. And their hair colors are off.
While I love the movie the subtitles on this dvd(not even sure that this is not a bootleg copy) are just HORRIBLE. I would wait for one of the american companies to pick this up.

Enjoyed watching the previous episodes so I am excited when they came out with this movie.  I don't often watch made live action of the manga I've read but I take exception to this one.  The story & the characters are very well close to the manga.  I enjoyed the antics of the group as well as the drama. It was just the right combination. Highly recommended!

This order came early
I liked the movie and I liked how the movie of Ouran Highschool Host Club followed the plot line of the manga more then just the anime if you loved the manga you will love the movie.
Silly and goofy just like the anime! Loved it! Very accurate.
Very, Very Funny, Cute Men what more do I need to say?

I love Ouran High School Host Club anime series and this live action film is terrible. I watched the entire film although I knew from the first moments that it would not do justice to the original anime. I hoped and hoped but... NO!! This is poor quality and disrespectful to the original series. I felt like I had to translate the subtitles!! Really!! They got my money... Don't let them get yours!!
Shipped fast, funny, definitely worth every dollar

Such a cute movie especially if you are a fan of the show and manga. It got to me really fast as well! My only disappointments are that the picture quality wasn't the best and the English subtitles aren't that good. They seem like very literal translations, so because of that sometimes it's hard to understand.
Great movie, very funny.  Tells a new story while including themes from the anime.  Great acting, too.
Great Movie - Keep in mind to watch the series too.
This was a fun way to keep the show going. It was funny & dramatic at the same time. The english subtitles are good but they could be better. Other than that it was a good show.
Live Action of Ouran High School Host Club was a silly take on the anime if you like the anime you may like the movie.
